textBox.richText: Gunter and I try and do all the black runs under the c-lift...needless to say I was *really* sore after that. He convinced me to try the chutes early in the day...I’m still not ready for that. Too narrow, too many rocks, and *way* too steep. After a couple turns, I traversed through the trees to Runaway. The other milestone...it’s getting towards the end of the day, and Gunter convinces me to try and find Gaz’s Gate. I agree (foolishly). We do the turn-off from roundhouse, and start climbing up. There’s a fork, and since we’re both tired of skating uphill, we take the lower branch, which leads us to a cliff. Not enough room to get your skis sideways. We both end up taking our skis off and scooting down...not really much fun. With all that, I’m not agreeing to a crazy “lets do this!” until 2012!
